name: AWS IoT Things Graph
short: A service in AWS that makes it easy to visually connect different devices and web services to build IoT applications.
description: AWS IoT Things Graph is a service that simplifies the integration of different devices and web services, allowing them to work together. It provides a visual interface to model and automate complex interactions and processes, making it easier to build IoT applications. It supports devices that use standard IoT protocols such as MQTT and HTTP. IoT Things Graph allows developers to focus on building applications, while the service handles the underlying interactions between devices and services.
